name: accent-color
description: Specifies the accent color for UI controls.

name: align-content
description: Aligns flex items along the cross axis.

name: align-items
description: Aligns flex items along the cross axis.

name: align-self
description: Aligns a flex item along the cross axis.

name: all
description: Resets all properties (except for 'unicode-bidi' and 'direction') to their initial or inherited value.

name: animation
description: Shorthand property for setting all animation properties.

name: animation-delay
description: Specifies the delay before the animation starts.

name: animation-direction
description: Specifies the direction of the animation.

name: animation-duration
description: Specifies the duration of the animation.

name: animation-fill-mode
description: Specifies how a CSS animation should apply styles to its target before and after it is executing.

name: animation-iteration-count
description: Specifies the number of times an animation should be played.

name: animation-name
description: Specifies the name of the animation.

name: animation-play-state
description: Specifies whether the animation is running or paused.

name: animation-timing-function
description: Specifies the speed curve of the animation.

name: appearance
description: Defines the appearance of an element.

name: aspect-ratio
description: Defines the aspect ratio of an element.

name: backdrop-filter
description: Applies a filter effect to the area behind an element.

name: backface-visibility
description: Defines whether the back face of an element is visible when turned towards the user.

name: background
description: Shorthand property for setting all background properties.

name: block-size
description: Defines the block size of an element.

name: border
description: Shorthand property for setting all border properties.

name: bottom
description: Defines the bottom position of an element.

name: box-content
description: Specifies the box model used for an element.

name: box-shadow
description: Applies one or more shadows to an element.

name: break-after
description: Specifies the page break behavior after an element.

name: break-before
description: Specifies the page break behavior before an element.

name: break-inside
description: Specifies the page break behavior inside an element.

name: caption-side
description: Specifies the placement of a table caption.

name: caret-color
description: Specifies the color of the text input caret.

name: clear
description: Specifies whether an element can be moved to the next line.

name: clip-path
description: Defines a clipping region for an element.

name: color
description: Specifies the text color of an element.

name: column-count
description: Specifies the number of columns an element should be divided into.

name: columns
description: Shorthand property for setting column-count and column-width.

name: contain
description: Defines the containment context for an element.

name: container-type
description: Defines the type of container for an element.

name: content
description: Generates content before or after an element.

name: content-visibility
description: Specifies whether the content of an element is visible or not.

name: counter-increment
description: Increments a counter by a specified value.

name: counter-reset
description: Resets a counter to a specified value.

name: cursor
description: Specifies the type of cursor to be displayed.

name: cx
description: Defines the x-axis coordinate of the center of a circle.

name: cy
description: Defines the y-axis coordinate of the center of a circle.

name: d
description: Defines a path for SVG elements.

name: direction
description: Specifies the text direction.

name: display
description: Specifies the display behavior of an element.

name: dominant-baseline
description: Specifies the dominant baseline for text alignment.

name: empty-cells
description: Specifies whether to display borders on empty cells in a table.

name: fill
description: Specifies the fill color for SVG elements.

name: filter
description: Applies graphical effects to an element.

name: flex
description: Shorthand property for setting flex-grow, flex-shrink, and flex-basis.

name: float
description: Specifies how an element should float.

name: flood-color
description: Specifies the color of a flood effect in SVG.

name: flood-opacity
description: Specifies the opacity of a flood effect in SVG.

name: font
description: Shorthand property for setting all font properties.

name: forced-color-adjust
description: Specifies how to adjust colors in a forced color mode.

name: gap
description: Defines the gap between grid or flex items.

name: grid
description: Shorthand property for setting grid-template-areas, grid-template-columns, and grid-template-rows.

name: hanging-punctuation
description: Specifies whether punctuation should hang outside the box.

name: height
description: Specifies the height of an element.

name: hyphenate-character
description: Specifies the character used for hyphenation.

name: hyphenate-limit-chars
description: Specifies the character limits for hyphenation.

name: hyphens
description: Specifies how to handle hyphenation.

name: image-rendering
description: Specifies the image rendering algorithm.

name: initial-letter
description: Specifies the initial letter of a paragraph.

name: inline-size
description: Defines the inline size of an element.

name: isolation
description: Specifies the isolation level for an element.

name: justify-content
description: Aligns flex items along the main axis.

name: left
description: Defines the left position of an element.

name: letter-spacing
description: Specifies the spacing between letters.

name: line-height
description: Specifies the height of a line box.

name: list-style
description: Shorthand property for setting all list style properties.

name: margin
description: Shorthand property for setting all margin properties.

name: marker
description: Specifies the marker for SVG elements.

name: mask
description: Applies a mask to an element.

name: math-style
description: Specifies the math style for mathematical expressions.

name: max-height
description: Specifies the maximum height of an element.

name: max-width
description: Specifies the maximum width of an element.

name: min-height
description: Specifies the minimum height of an element.

name: min-width
description: Specifies the minimum width of an element.

name: mix-blend-mode
description: Specifies how an element should blend with its background.

name: object-fit
description: Specifies how an element's content should fit within its box.

name: object-position
description: Specifies the position of an element's content within its box.

name: offset
description: Shorthand property for setting offset properties.

name: opacity
description: Specifies the transparency level of an element.

name: order
description: Specifies the order of a flex item in a flex container.

name: orphans
description: Specifies the minimum number of lines in a block container that must be left at the bottom of a page.

name: outline
description: Shorthand property for setting all outline properties.

name: overflow
description: Specifies what happens if content overflows an element's box.

name: overscroll-behavior
description: Specifies what happens when an element is scrolled to the edge.

name: padding
description: Shorthand property for setting all padding properties.

name: page-break-after
description: Specifies the page break behavior after an element.

name: page-break-before
description: Specifies the page break behavior before an element.

name: page-break-inside
description: Specifies the page break behavior inside an element.

name: paint-order
description: Specifies the order in which the fill, stroke, and markers are painted.

name: perspective
description: Defines the perspective from which a 3D element is viewed.

name: perspective-origin
description: Defines the origin of the perspective view.

name: place-content
description: Shorthand property for setting align-content and justify-content.

name: place-items
description: Shorthand property for setting align-items and justify-items.

name: place-self
description: Shorthand property for setting align-self and justify-self.

name: pointer-events
description: Specifies how an element responds to pointer events.

name: position
description: Specifies the positioning method of an element.

name: print-color-adjust
description: Specifies how colors should be adjusted for printing.

name: quotes
description: Specifies the type of quotation marks to use.

name: r
description: Defines the radius of a circle or ellipse.

name: resize
description: Specifies whether an element is resizable by the user.

name: right
description: Defines the right position of an element.

name: rotate
description: Specifies the rotation of an element.

name: row-gap
description: Defines the gap between rows in a grid or flex container.

name: ruby-align
description: Specifies the alignment of ruby annotations.

name: ruby-position
description: Specifies the position of ruby annotations.

name: rx
description: Defines the x-axis radius of an ellipse.

name: ry
description: Defines the y-axis radius of an ellipse.

name: scale
description: Specifies the scale transformation of an element.

name: scrollbar-color
description: Specifies the color of scrollbars.

name: scrollbar-width
description: Specifies the width of scrollbars.

name: shape-rendering
description: Specifies the rendering quality of shapes.

name: stop-color
description: Specifies the color of a gradient stop.

name: stop-opacity
description: Specifies the opacity of a gradient stop.

name: stroke
description: Specifies the stroke color for SVG elements.

name: tab-size
description: Specifies the width of a tab character.

name: table-layout
description: Specifies the layout algorithm for a table.

name: text-align
description: Specifies the horizontal alignment of text.

name: text-decoration
description: Shorthand property for setting all text decoration properties.

name: text-indent
description: Specifies the indentation of the first line of text.

name: text-transform
description: Specifies the capitalization of text.

name: text-underline-offset
description: Specifies the offset of the underline from the text.

name: text-underline-position
description: Specifies the position of the underline.

name: top
description: Defines the top position of an element.

name: touch-action
description: Specifies how touch events are handled.

name: transform-style
description: Specifies the rendering of 3D transformed elements.

name: transition
description: Shorthand property for setting all transition properties.

name: transition-delay
description: Specifies the delay before the transition starts.

name: transition-duration
description: Specifies the duration of the transition.

name: transition-property
description: Specifies the name of the CSS property to which the transition is applied.

name: transition-timing-function
description: Specifies the timing function of a transition.

name: translate
description: Specifies the translation transformation of an element.

name: unicode-bidi
description: Specifies the level of embedding or override for bidirectional text.

name: user-modify
description: Specifies whether the user can modify the content of an element.

name: user-select
description: Specifies whether the user can select text.

name: vector-effect
description: Specifies the rendering effect for vector graphics.

name: vertical-align
description: Specifies the vertical alignment of an element.

name: view-*-box
description: Defines a view box for SVG elements.

name: visibility
description: Specifies whether an element is visible or not.

name: white-space
description: Specifies how white space inside an element is handled.

name: widows
description: Specifies the minimum number of lines in a block container that must be left at the top of a page.

name: width
description: Specifies the width of an element.

name: will-change
description: Hints to the browser about what properties will change in the future.

name: word-break
description: Specifies how words should break when reaching the end of a line.

name: word-spacing
description: Specifies the spacing between words.

name: writing-mode
description: Specifies the direction in which text is written.

name: x
description: Defines the x-axis coordinate of an element.

name: y
description: Defines the y-axis coordinate of an element.

name: z-index
description: Specifies the stack order of an element.

name: zoom
description: Specifies the zoom level of an element.
